titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain drawback claims relating to certain speakers.
To provide for the reliquidation of certain drawback claims relating to certain speakers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to reliquidate certain drawback claims with respect to certain entries of speakers into the United States and pay any amounts owed due to such reliquidation.
